game.name: Tiny Onion Knight
game.shortDescription: 작은 양파 기사는 작은 양파 기사가 악을 물리 치고 오크에 의해 파괴 자신의 정원을 재건하기 위해 신비로운 숲으로 이동하는 흥미 진진한 액션 플랫 포머입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Tiny Onion Knight is an action-platformer about a little onion knight who travels through a mystical forest.

reviewHighlights.text: A sweet and addictive platformer: you play as an onion knight, explore a magical forest, jump, and slash enemies. The graphics are simple yet stylish.
This game is really fun! The onion knight is cool, the forest looks nice, and fighting orcs is super easy to get into. I liked it a lot and would play...
